songs.title: Disappear
songs.lyrics:
[Intro]
Disappear

[Verse 1]
I remember the first time
But it wasn't the last time
That you told me that you'd take me back
So I'm still wondering why
It was ever a question
I should have learned my lesson
I keep coming back like a heart attack
That's always breaking

[Pre-Chorus]
I can't let you vanish
There's no magic when you're gone

[Chorus]
You say you don't need me
You say, "this time believe me"
I'm not gonna let you disappear (disappear)
I don't want to hear it
I don't want to believe it
I'm not gonna let you disappear (disappear)

[Refrain]
Oh, oh, oh, oh, oh
Oh, oh, oh, oh, oh
Oh, oh, oh, oh, oh
Disappear

[Verse2]
I don't want to be lonely
But you were always the only
One who cast a spell and made it feel
Like all of this was real
Nothing but an illusion
But I'm not gonna lose you
So just do your trick and make it quick
Cause I'm pretending

[Pre-Chorus]
I can't let you vanish
There's no magic when you're gone

[Chorus]
You say you don't need me
You say, "this time believe me"
I'm not gonna let you disappear (disappear)
I don't want to hear it
I don't want to believe it
I'm not gonna let you disappear (disappear)

[Refrain]
Oh, oh, oh, oh, oh
Oh, oh, oh, oh, oh
Oh, oh, oh, oh, oh
Disappear

[Spoken]
Don't go!

[Pre-Chorus]
I can't let you vanish
There's no magic when you're gone

[Refrain]
Oh, oh, oh, oh, oh
Oh, oh, oh, oh, oh
Oh, oh, oh, oh, oh
Disappear

[Chorus]
You say you don't need me
You say, "this time believe me"
I'm not gonna let you disappear (disappear)
I don't want to hear it
I don't want to believe it
I'm not gonna let you disappear (disappear)

[Refrain]
Oh, oh, oh, oh, oh
Oh, oh, oh, oh, oh
Oh, oh, oh, oh, oh
Disappear (disappear)

[Refrain]
Oh, oh, oh, oh, oh
Oh, oh, oh, oh, oh
Oh, oh, oh, oh, oh
Disappear (disappear)

[Spoken]
Don't go!

[Outro]
Disappear
